DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety pharmacokinetics CKD-330 ( fixed-dose combination Candesartan 16 mg Amlodipine 5 mg ) coadministration two separate drug healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study ( Candesartan 16 mg Amlodipine 5 mg ) - A
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male volunteer age 19 45 year old . 2 . Body weight ≥ 55 kg Body weight range calculate IBW ±20 % . 3 . Subjects without hereditary problem chronic disease . 4 . Subjects whose clinical laboratory test value inside accept normal range . 5 . Understand requirement study voluntarily consent participate study . 1 . Previous history present clinically significant hepatobiliary , nephrological , neurologic , respiratory , hematooncological , endocrine , urogenital , psychiatric , musculoskeletal , immune , otorhinolaryngological , cardiovascular system . 2 . History gastrointestinal disease gastrointestinal surgery affect drug absorption . 3 . History clinically significant allergy amlodipine candesartan CCB ARB aspirin antibiotic . 4 . Subjects galactose intolerance . 5 . SBP ≥ 140 mmHg < 90 mmHg , DBP ≥ 95 mmHg < 60 mmHg , pulse ≥ 100 BPM . 6 . AST ALT > 2*ULN , total bilirubin > 2*ULN 7 . Serum Creatinine > ULN 8 . Previous history present drug abuse . 9 . Subjects treat metabolize enzyme inducer inhibitor barbital within 1 month prior first dose . 10 . Subjects treat ethical drug herbal medicine within 2 week , OTC vitamin within 1 week prior first dose . 11 . Subjects treat IP within 2 month prior first dose . 12 . Subjects whole blood donation within 2 month component blood donation within 1 month blood transfusion within 1 month prior first dose . 13 . Alcohol > 21 units/week stop drinking . 14 . Cigarette > 10 cigarettes/day . 15 . Subjects plan dental treatment ( extraction , orthodontic , nerve treatment ) surgery ( plastic surgery , eye surgery LASIK , LASEK ) . 16 . Not eligible participate study discretion investigator .
